name: Maeldor: Quest Of The Artifact
description:
Ready to fight against the Darkness growing in the heart of the Maeldor? You think you have the skills and courage to battle and save the Maeldor from this doom? A land full of dangers, monsters, traps, treasures and much more!

Jump into this epic story, control one of 3 legendary heroes of Maeldor, Turmaeg, Thilberiel or Pelethorn in this fluent adventure filled with action! A magical fantasy world which is on the edge of destruction is waiting for you to be discovered!



CHARACTER UPGRADES
Build up your skills and abilities to become stronger and reveal the true power of legendary heroes! Turmaeg was gifted with the Armor and Sword of the Moon, by the Goddess Kuuli herself, while Anoriel carries the legendary bow of "Tura" which was made by the unbreakable trees of Narinar Forest, and Pelethorn who is blessed with the "Soul Water Summon" ability travels with his "Water Soul" to help him on his journey! Upgrade your character to unveil their great power and become unstoppable!



DIFFERENT ENEMIES
Orcs, vampires, pirates, necromancers, dragons and much more! Fight against the servants of the darkness to conquer them with the lights of the moon!



BOSS FIGHTS
Maeldor is a dangerous place, let me assure you of that! 8 legendary end level boss with unique fighting styles! You must defeat them if you want to continue your journey!



HANDCRAFTED WORLD
Everything you see in this game is handcrafted! Unique levels to travel and explore! From dense green and golden forests to the barren and dead frozen lands, this beautiful magical fantasy world is waiting for you!



FIND TREASURES
Explore huge levels, choose different paths, and find hidden treasures! Uncover the secrets in this magical realm!



BE PART OF AN EPIC STORY
Besides the epic story where you fight for the fate of the Maeldor, you can also discover and meet with lots of different inhabitants of the Maeldor, learn about their stories, and sometimes even be part of it! And don't forget about the Ancient Lore Altars! Search the levels and find them to learn more about the history of the Maeldor!



A great adventure is ahead of you and with the guidance of wizard Aglaroth, you will hunt monsters, fight against the orc king, sail on a pirate ship, become a hunter, discover hidden treasures, and challenge yourself in this quest to save the Maeldor!
